/* Feminism in many forms */ stylistic edits
Stylistic changes (mostly word-level, some sentence-level) to make the article more readable--mostly minor, but I'd appreciate a check on my regrouping of items in the second paragraph.
/* Contemporary criticisms of feminism */ Various corrections.
/* Worldwide statistics */ Fixed one reference, and removed another, as it was a Wikipedia article.
/* Effects of feminism in the West */ Fixed two sources.
/* Modern feminism */ Flowing a sentence and correcting punctuation.
